element.name: TLight
element.short: Basic type for saving light values for each channel

element.name: TLongLight
element.short: Same as TLight, but basic on Integers
element.descr: It has values from 0 to MAX_LIGHT_LEVEL

element.name: TRealLight
element.short: It storages light level as real value - from 0 to 1

element.name: TColor3f
element.short: It storages light level as real value - from 0 to 1

element.name: TColor3b
element.descr: It is different from TLight because converting from light to color could be non-linear.
